review_body: This is the home field for the Nexen Heroes (Jung Ho Kang's old club). You are allowed to bring in food/alcohol from outside. Location: Near a subway station (Omokgyo - Line 5), but you will have to walk about a quarter to a half mile to get to the stadium.Cost: Price on weekday (Tue-Thu) are much more reasonable (starting at 10,000W) than weekend (Starting at 18,000W).Amenities: Rooms for nursing mothers, smokers. Food options:- Restaurants by the subway station - Vendors outside the stadium (ex. fried chicken meal set appx. 10,000W).- Inside stadium (Korean snack foods, hot dogs, pizza).
